= Religion Chooser =

*Please notice:* The Religion Chooser application aims to be a fun application based on a choice tree structure created by holytaco.com: http://www.holytaco.com/flowchart-determine-what-religion-you-should-follow

For more information about Religion Chooser application please check out the [ReligionChooserFeatureSpec Feature Specification] document. Implementations with different Flex versions and MVC frameworks are listed below. The code follows additional Flex coding conventions (Flex 4 TODO).
